product_name: E-Case iSeries iPod nano Case - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its sleek 4-pole headphone jack, you can run a little faster or ski a little harder with the music pumping no matter the conditions, thanks to the waterproof E-Case iSeries iPod nano case.
short_description: With its sleek 4-pole headphone jack, you can run a little faster or ski a little harder with the music pumping no matter the conditions, thanks to the waterproof E-Case iSeries iPod nano case.
